trans-unit.source: Provides methods and attached properties that support data validation.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce metodi e proprietà associate che supportano la convalida dei dati.

trans-unit.source: For a detailed discussion of the validation process, see "Data Validation" in [Data Binding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per una descrizione dettagliata del processo di convalida, vedere "Convalida dei dati" in [Panoramica del Data Binding](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Adds an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error> attached event to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un gestore eventi per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error>evento associato all'oggetto specificato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to add `handler` to.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to add `handler` to.

trans-unit.source: The handler to add.
Removes all <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> objects from the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove tutti <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"> </xref> oggetti dall'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpressionBase"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The `bindingExpression` object may have been invalid from a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.MarkInvalid%2A> call or a previously failed validation.
trans-unit.target: Il `bindingExpression` oggetto potrebbe essere stato non valido in un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.MarkInvalid%2A>chiamata o una convalida non riuscita in precedenza.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.MarkInvalid%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object is valid after this call.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto è valido dopo questa chiamata.

trans-unit.source: The object to turn valid.
If bindingExpression is .
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error> attached event.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors*> attached property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate*> attached property.
To be added.
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors*> attached property of the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors*>associata una proprietà dell'elemento specificato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Errors*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to read the value from.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> oggetto da cui leggere il valore.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyObservableCollection%601> of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> objects.
If element is .
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate*> attached property of the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate*>associata una proprietà dell'elemento specificato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to read the value from.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> oggetto da cui leggere il valore.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate"></xref> used to generate validation error feedback on the adorner layer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate"> </xref> utilizzato per generare il feedback al livello dell'adorner errore di convalida.

trans-unit.source: If element is .
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError*> attached property of the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError*>associata una proprietà dell'elemento specificato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to read the value from.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> oggetto da cui leggere il valore.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError*> attached property of the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError*>associata una proprietà dell'elemento specificato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError*>

trans-unit.source: If element is .
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*> attached property for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*>proprietà associata per l'elemento specificato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*>

trans-unit.source: The element from which to get the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*>.
The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*>.
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*> attached property for the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*>proprietà associata per l'elemento specificato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*>

trans-unit.source: The element from which to get the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*>.
The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.HasError*> attached property.
To be added.
Marks the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> object as invalid with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Contrassegna l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"> </xref> come non validi con la proprietà specificata dell'oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression> object stays invalid until <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ClearInvalid%2A> is called or another transfer to the binding source validates successfully.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>oggetto rimane valido fino a quando <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ClearInvalid%2A>viene chiamato o un altro trasferimento all'origine dell'associazione viene convalidato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ClearInvalid%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"></xref> object to mark as invalid.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Data.BindingExpression"> </xref> oggetto da contrassegnare come non valido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ValidationError"></xref> object to use.
If validationError is .
Adds an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error> attached event from the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un gestore eventi per il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error>evento associato dall'oggetto specificato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.Error>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to remove `handler` from.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> o <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"> </xref> oggetto da rimuovere `handler` da.

trans-unit.source: The handler to remove.
Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate*> attached property to the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate*>proprietà associata all'elemento specificato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ErrorTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to set `value` on.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> object to set `value` on.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate"></xref> to use to generate validation error feedback on the adorner layer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate"> </xref> da utilizzare per generare il feedback al livello dell'adorner errore di convalida.

trans-unit.source: If element is .
Sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*> attached property to the specified value on the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*>proprietà associata al valore specificato nell'elemento specificato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*>

trans-unit.source: The element on which to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*> of the specified element.
Sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*> attached property to the specified value on the specified element.
trans-unit.target: Imposta il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*>proprietà associata al valore specificato nell'elemento specificato.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*>

trans-unit.source: The element on which to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*>.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*> of the specified element.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSiteFor*> attached property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Validation.ValidationAdornerSite*> attached property.
To be added.
